name: ESOL – Level 1 Foundations Academic English, Listening & Speaking
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  No previous study in English.  Listening comprehension of Foundations 1 texts; communicate with increasing fluency and accuracy about ideas from course themes.
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
column12: Registration Information: Concurrent registration in AEFN 8112 and AEFN 8113.

name: ESOL– Level 1 Foundations Academic English, Reading & Writing
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  No previous study in English. Reading comprehension of Foundations 1 texts; complete well-developed and organized Foundations 1 writing tasks about ideas from course themes.
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
column12: Registration Information: Concurrent registration in AEFN 8110 and AEFN 8113.

name: ESOL – Level 1 Foundations Academic English, Grammar
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  No previous study in English. Focus on grammatical structures present in Foundations 1 reading and listening texts; incorporate learned grammatical structures in Foundations 1 writing and speaking tasks.
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
column12: Registration Information: Concurrent registration in AEFN 8110 and AEFN 8112.

name: ESOL – Level 1 Foundations Academic English, General Non-Core  CEU
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  No previous study in English. Introduce and review technology tools and independent language learning strategies to support Foundations 1 language skill development.
prerequisite: Prerequisite:  AEFN 8110 to 8113 with a minimum grade of S++ - at least 1 course, may be taken concurrently.
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
